articles.description: Global stock markets fell on Monday as expectations of faster growth and quickening inflation battered bonds, boosted commodities and led to a further rotation out of the big tech names that have driven the equity rally during the pandemic.

articles.title: MLGW: Boil water notice is in effect until further notice - WREG NewsChannel 3
articles.description: MEMPHIS, Tenn. —MLGW said despite warmer temperatures, the boil water notice is in effect until further notice. Officials said while there are no contaminants in the water, they’re aware of, they’re still seeing low pressure. Additionally, they said the water…
